verses.name: Psalms 104:1
verses.text: Bless the Lord, O my soul. O Lord my God, thou art very great; thou art clothed with honour and majesty.

verses.name: Psalms 104:2
verses.text: Who coverest thyself with light as with a garment: who stretchest out the heavens like a curtain:

verses.name: Psalms 104:3
verses.text: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters: who maketh the clouds his chariot: who walketh upon the wings of the wind:

verses.name: Psalms 104:4
verses.text: Who maketh his angels spirits; his ministers a flaming fire:

verses.name: Psalms 104:5
verses.text: Who laid the foundations of the earth, that it should not be removed for ever.
